report.title: Osiris tabular resources
report.query: select #columns# from ( select t_r.id as "id", t_r.id as "term_id", case when p.id=t_sb.id then 0 else t_r.parent_id end as "parent_r_id", t_bb.term as "bb_term", t_sb.term as "sb_term", case when p.id=t_sb.id then '' else '' || p.term || ' >> ' end || '' || t_r.term || '' as "term", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as "speciescount", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::float * 100 / ( select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#r_attr_id# and avsub.int_value=t_r.id ) as "rep", sqi.sqi, nullif(count(distinct case when ttd.taxon_id is null then null else ttl.taxon_meaning_id end), 0) as "cons_count", string_agg(coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation), '|' order by td.code) as "cons" from cache_termlists_terms t_bb join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_bb on av_bb.int_value=t_bb.id and av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#bb_attr_id# and av_bb.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_bb.taxa_taxon_list_id #joins# join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=cttl.id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_sb on av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_sb.deleted=false and av_sb.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#sb_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t_sb on t_sb.id=av_sb.int_value and t_sb.parent_id=t_bb.id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_r on av_r.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_r.deleted=false and av_r.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#r_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t_r on t_r.id=av_r.int_value -- exclude subheadings - GitHub #53 and t_r.term not in ( 'base status','humidity','terrestrial aspect','habitats','soil type','flow', 'woodland habitat','soil humidity','tree species','conifer or broadleaved' ) join cache_termlists_terms p on p.id=t_r.parent_id and (p.parent_id=t_sb.id or t_r.parent_id=t_sb.id) left join ( select av_r1.int_value as r_id, round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100) as sqi from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_r1 on av_r1.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_r1.deleted=false and av_r1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#r_attr_id# join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# #joins# group by av_r1.int_value ) as sqi on sqi.r_id=av_r.int_value left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttd join taxon_designations td on td.id=ttd.taxon_designation_id and td.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms cat on cat.id=td.category_id and ( (cat.term='GB Red List' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('LC', 'NA', 'pLC', 'pNA', 'NE')) or (cat.term='GB Status' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('None', 'Not reviewed', 'Not native')) or (cat.term not in ('GB Red List', 'GB Status')) ) ) on ttd.taxon_id=ttl.taxon_id and ttd.deleted=false group by t_r.id, t_r.id, case when p.id=t_sb.id then 0 else t_r.parent_id end, t_bb.term, t_sb.term, sqi.sqi, case when p.id=t_sb.id then '' else '' || p.term || ' >> ' end || '' || t_r.term || '' ) as sub

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.website_id in (#website_ids#) and o.survey_id=(select survey_id from samples where id=#sample_id#) and o.sample_id=#sample_id# and o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id=#sample_id#

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
